page.title: 08Housing.Hoo area cont.
page.content: Post-war private developments are also to be found in Brandeston & Kettleburgh and these comprise a mixture of bungalows and chalet-bungalows,together with a certain amount of "in-filling" with the odd cottage-type house of rec- ent construction.There are local planning restrictions on all building in the area,whether for housing or for agricultural use. Houses are "graded" according to their age and it is difficult to get permiss- ion to alter a "listed" building- i.e. one that is of architectural or historical interest,or to develop new building sites outside a "planning"area e.g. on agricultural land.
